SELECT rm.id, rm.username, rb.realName, rm.status, rb.cardNum, rm.email, rb.IDCardNo, rb.bankName, rb.branch, rb.cnaps_Code AS cnapsCode, rb.status as bankCardStatus, rb.BANKVERIF as bankVerify, rb.ADDTIME as addTime FROM rocky_member rm INNER JOIN rocky_bankinfo rb ON (rm.id = rb.user_id and rb.status <> -1) WHERE rm.Username like CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%') AND rb.realName like CONCAT('%',#{realName},'%')
and rb.BANKVERIF =#{verifyStatus}
and rb.ADDTIME>= DATE(#{dateTimeStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
and rb.ADDTIME < DATE_ADD(DATE(#{dateTimeEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}),INTERVAL 1 DAY)
order by rm.id

SELECT count(*) FROM rocky_member rm INNER JOIN rocky_bankinfo rb ON (rm.id = rb.user_id and rb.status = 0) WHERE rm.Username like CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%') AND rb.realName like CONCAT('%',#{realName},'%')
and rb.BANKVERIF =#{verifyStatus}
and rb.ADDTIME>= DATE(#{dateTimeStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
and rb.ADDTIME < DATE_ADD(DATE(#{dateTimeEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}),INTERVAL 1 DAY)
